questions: What are the expected properties of a loyalty card?
What type of data is expected for the "expires" property?
What is an example of a valid "name" property?
answer:
## Expected properties
!!! Tip 
    
    All properties are optional. If any property is missing it will not be processed and no error will be reported.

| Name    | Expected type   | Example                                            |
|---------|-----------------|----------------------------------------------------|
| expires | datetime        | 2023-12-31T23:59:59.999Z                          |
| name    | string          | My Loyalty Card                                    |
| issuer  | string          | MyStore                                            |
| id      | string          | 12345                                              |
